dcterms:creator: Z. Huang
et al.
dcterms:description: The Tufts fNIRS dataset encompasses fNIRS data derived from a cohort of 68 participants engaged in a series of controlled n-back tasks, including 0-back, 1-back, 2-back, and 3-back scenarios. The dataset includes temporal traces of alternating current intensity and changes in phase at two distinct wavelengths (690 and 830 nm), employing a modulation frequency of 110 MHz.
dcterms:title: Tufts fNIRS dataset
